recipe.title: Pickled Jalapeno Mix

recipeinfo.blurb: A zesty south of the border appetizer.
recipeinfo.author: David Horton

recipe.preparation: Combine vinegar, water and salt in a 2-quart saucepan and bring to a boil. Combine jalapenos, mushrooms, onion, carrots and bay leaves in a bowl. Pour hot vinegar solution over peppers and vegetables. Cover and refrigerate.
recipe.serving: Serve with tortilla chips as an appetizer.
recipe.notes: Leftovers may be kept in the refrigerator for a long time without spoilage because of the preserving effects of the vinegar and hot peppers.
